PrecisCERTAIN FORMER EMPLOYEES OF SDL OPTICS, INC. REMISSION ORDER NO. 2 - which provides for the remission of some or all of the income tax paid or payable by three taxpayers in respect of shares acquired in the years 1999 and 2000 through an employee stock purchase plan.
